currentIssues.description: Text contrast on gray lyrics (5D5D5D) fails WCAG AAA standards against black background
currentIssues.location: Lyrics text 'my troubles seemed so far a way'

currentIssues.description: Chord labels (Fmaj7, Em7, etc.) blend into lyrics without clear visual separation
Inconsistent text sizing between UI controls and performance text
currentIssues.location: Header buttons vs main lyrics display

currentIssues.description: Upload Song and Demo buttons lack visual states and proper styling
Insufficient vertical spacing between chord progressions and lyrics
currentIssues.location: Between chord symbols and lyric lines

recommendations.title: Improve lyrics text contrast to WCAG AAA
recommendations.description: Change gray lyrics (#5D5D5D) to lighter gray (#B0B0B0) for 7:1 contrast ratio suitable for stage viewing

recommendations.title: Add rhythm-based vertical spacing
recommendations.description: Increase space between chord/lyric pairs to match musical phrasing and improve readability at distance

recommendations.title: Create distinct chord highlight system
recommendations.description: Add semi-transparent colored backgrounds behind chord symbols for instant recognition during performance
recommendations.code: className='inline-block px-3 py-1 bg-amber-500/20 text-amber-400 rounded-md font-bold text-4xl'

recommendations.title: Implement responsive text scaling for teleprompter mode
recommendations.description: Use viewport units (vw) for automatic text scaling based on screen size and viewing distance
recommendations.code: className='text-[4vw] leading-[1.6] tracking-wide' // Scales with viewport

recommendations.title: Add visual feedback to header controls
recommendations.description: Style Upload/Demo buttons with proper hover states and active indicators for touch/click feedback
recommendations.code: className='px-4 py-2 bg-white/10 hover:bg-white/20 active:bg-white/30 transition-colors rounded-lg'
